thread.title: Paul in Germany
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Paul in Germany

author: Paul in Germany
title: Paul in Germany
text: Delivery to Germany was super quick. Call to the customer service number to choose the product in question (different Barbour jackets) was competent and friendly. Prices were about the best in the Internet for the items. One click Pound to Euro conversion for the price was convenient and fair, and in line with current exchange rates. helpful wa also the page on your site to watch out for fake sites, because I did indeed Google one. Hope Internet sales between the UK and EU will be as easy and customs tax free after Brexit.
